tv.generator-info-name: Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v1.0

programme.title: Rage New Music
programme.desc: Discover the wildest new music videos on rage. Essential grooves and boundary-pushing visuals from Australia and beyond.

programme.title: Rage Charts
programme.desc: Count down the hottest chart hits, and catch up on some of the most promising new popular music videos on rage.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going every Saturday morning with wall-to-wall music videos, from classic hits and long-forgotten tracks from the rage vault, to the latest new releases and special features.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the days top stories and the latest news including updated information, warnings and reports on Cyclone Fina tracking off the Northern Territory coast.

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Maigret is forced to confront his past when a politically connected billionaire demands his help.

programme.title: I Was Actually There
programme.sub-title: Sydney To Hobart Yacht Race Tragedy
programme.desc: The 1998 Sydney to Hobart race was a moment when nature asserted its dominance with terrifying force. Six lives were lost, five yachts sank and hundreds of sailors were pulled into a brutal fight for survival. (Final)

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: DCI Vera Stanhope investigates the mysterious death of a young man whose remains are discovered in remote caves in an area notorious for illicit teenage gatherings.

programme.title: rage Guest Programmer: BBNO$
programme.desc: Join Vancouver viral-sensation and musical mischief-maker BBNO$ as he guest programs rage, serving up a playlist thats almost as chaotic as he is.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going with wall-to-wall music videos, from new releases to classics and the long-forgotten.

programme.title: Insiders
programme.desc: David Speers discusses the week in politics with Niki Savva, Tom Crowley and Mark Kenny including Victorian and NSW Liberals topple and install new leaders, plus COP, G20, environment laws, CSIRO cuts and hospital funding.

programme.title: The World This Week
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani presents a roundup of the weeks big stories. Donald Trump approves the release of the Epstein files, Sheikh Hasina sentenced to death in Bangladesh, and deadly Russian strikes on western Ukraine.

programme.title: Songs Of Praise: Young Chorister Of The Year - Final
programme.desc: Its the final of BBC Young Chorister Of The Year from The Monastery in Manchester, presented by Aled Jones and the Rev. Kate Bottley.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Costa explores a new native public garden, Sophie visits a whimsical coastal retreat, Josh finds a lush South American-style courtyard, Tammy discovers a tropical haven, and Millie tours a home that doubles as a greenhouse.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Long Lost Family takes up a double search on Kate Browns behalf and unravels more and more family not just for Kate, but for those she meets along the way.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: Richard Rowles plans to live with climate change, by building a flood proof house on the banks of the volatile Brisbane River.

programme.title: Portrait Artist Of The Year
programme.desc: This heat features nine artists from across the country. The sitters are comedian Rhys Nicholson, chef Adam Liaw, and radio/TV host Myf Warhurst.

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.sub-title: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed And Vampire Survivors
programme.desc: This week we battle through hordes of supernatural foes in Vampire Survivors, and strap on our proton packs to bust some poltergeists in the multiplayer action of Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed!

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going with wall-to-wall music videos, from new releases to classics and the long-forgotten.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Comedian and childrens author Rosie Jones is here to help Rattus choose his World Book Day outfit, and discover the gory details behind some favourite childrens books!

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Peculiar Pop Quiz
programme.desc: Maudie and Ava infiltrate Mr Barkers grade six class to watch his famous pop quiz, where Maudie uncovers a crime.

programme.title: Star Wars: Young Jedi Adventures
programme.desc: Kai tries to help Nash with deliveries.

programme.title: Hard Quiz Kids
programme.sub-title: Dolphins, Jasprit Bumrah, The Titanic and Pluto
programme.desc: Chasing after Tom Gleesons Big Brass Mug this week are Veda with dolphins, Viyona with cricket legend Jasprit Bumrah, Tyler with the Titanic and Hrishi with Pluto!

programme.title: Abbott Elementary
programme.desc: The teachers are back at Willard R. Abbott Public School for development week.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.sub-title: A Chance Appears In A Tight Spot! Launch A Counteroffensive, Goku!
programme.desc: Goku is having trouble facing Golden Frieza until he realises the other is quickly losing stamina. Gaining the upper hand, Goku gives Frieza a chance to leave Earth for good.

programme.title: BTN High
programme.desc: The social media ban wont prevent teens from using YouTube, as long as theyre not logged into an account. But experts warn browsing the site this way could increase the risk of teens being exposed to dangerous content.

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.sub-title: Pokemon Scarlet and Violet And Human Fall Flat Challenge
programme.desc: This week we catch em all in the wide open Paldea region in Pokemon Scarlet and Violet, plus we take on the challenge of The Tower in Human Fall Flat.

programme.title: rage Guest Programmer: Teen Jesus and The Jean Teasers
programme.desc: Join Teen Jesus and the Jean Teasers as they guest program rage for the very first time, picking their favourite clips and celebrating their new album GLORY.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: Theres a snot-tastic dose of Ouchology when the doctors face tough medical questions, and a VIP guest is due in the lab but with a long list of requests, will the Doctors be ready for their arrival?

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: When Marinette and Zoe are chosen to organise the end-of-school-year party, a common enemy of the girls tries to ruin their beautiful friendship.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: In a bid to help move Shirley around the farm, Shaun has the idea of fitting up Shirley with wheels.

programme.title: Crongton
programme.desc: Liccle Bits secret is exposed after the gang stages a break-in to help Venetia.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Zoo
programme.desc: The zoos penguin colony gets annual exams, and the staff holds its collective breath as a rare pangolin pregnancy unfolds at the Columbus Zoo.

programme.title: rage Vault Guest Programmer: Magic Dirt
programme.desc: Marking 25 years since the release of their hit single Dirty Jeans rage replays Magic Dirts very first rage hosting from 1997.

programme.title: Unforgotten
programme.desc: For better or worse, Jess and Sunny get the truth from Asif, Marty, Mel, and Juliet, and Gerry Coopers killer is revealed. But as ever, the truth leads to difficult decisions. (Final)

programme.title: ABC News Update
programme.desc: The headlines from ABC News, updating you on the days top stories from across Australia and around the world.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: The Doctors find out what happens when you eat with the help of a miniature Xand doll, test your ears and eyes in a baffling mind-bending trick, and join Dr Chris at work fighting infectious diseases.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.sub-title: He Who Is Of Saiyan Blood Trunks Resolve
programme.desc: The time machine repairs are finishing up. Vegeta and Future Trunks go training, but the extent of Vegetas power is unlike anything Future Trunks has ever seen.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania: The Series
programme.desc: Mavis dreams are haunted by a familiar undead face. Shes losing sleep and it could cost her dearly at the big Bludgeons and Dragons tournament.

programme.title: Mechamato
programme.desc: Amato and friends stay late after school to finish a project, but they soon realize that they are not alone.

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: Benton decides to blow the whistle on Vucelichs unethical study methods. Dougs birthday includes a surprise visit from his prodigal father. Carter spreads rumours about an affair between Mark and Susan.

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: After 15 viewings and not a hint of an offer on their home in West Sussex, retirees Tim and Gina want to upsize. Can Phil help turn their dark and cluttered 1950s house into an up-to-date, desirable residence?

programme.title: Live At The Apollo
programme.desc: This episode of the award-winning Live at the Apollo is hosted by the brilliant Ed Gamble who introduces comedians Tom Davis and Judi Love to the stage.

programme.title: My Family
programme.desc: In the grip of a mid-life crisis, Ben decides to sell his dental practice and take up a hobby, which he soon realises is incredibly boring. Meanwhile, Susans move up the art gallery ladder leads to more than one fall.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Regulars Sandi Toksvig and Alan Davies are joined by guests Matt Lucas, Holly Walsh and Susan Calman to discuss everything Postal. (Final)

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: After 15 viewings and not a hint of an offer on their home in West Sussex, retirees Tim and Gina want to upsize. Can Phil help turn their dark and cluttered 1950s house into an up-to-date, desirable residence?

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: The Doctors reveal the amazing organs that keep you alive before youre born, Dr Xand meets patients undergoing treatment at a burns clinic, and Dr Chris hits the high street to test another mind-bending trick.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.sub-title: Id Like To See Goku, You See A Summons From Grand Zeno!
programme.desc: Zeno demands to meet with Goku and asks him for something very odd. Meanwhile in the 10th Universe, Zamasus hatred for humans grows.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania: The Series
programme.desc: Mavis failed attempts to vampnotize her friends doesnt work, but then it works too well on Donald Cartwright, transforming him into the great Count Don!

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: The ER hosts eight heavily pregnant women when a sprinkler bursts in the maternity ward. Benton tries to bring a hopeless patient back from the brink of death in a marathon surgery. Social workers visit Lewis messy home.

programme.title: Mythbusters
programme.desc: Did Ben Franklin really fly a kite tied to a key in a storm and discover electricity? Plus, Adam and Jamie test some scientific facts about flatulance.

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: Phil travels to Grappnehall in Warrington to help Colin Brunold sell his four-bed detached house. Colin bought the house with his family 18 years ago, but now the kids are grown up and Colins remarried, its time to sell.

programme.title: Annabel Crabbs Civic Duty
programme.desc: In the early days, Parliament House hosted an all-male conclave of politicians and newspapermen, sharing a cramped environment and a complex code of conventions and mutual dependency. But the age of disruption has arrived.

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: Shep and Raul respond to a massive house fire without proper gear, risking their lives to save addicts and their children. Dougs relationship with his father worsens. Lewis learns her fate regarding plans to adopt her niece.

programme.title: In The Night Garden
programme.desc: Upsy Daisy and Igglepiggle are going for a walk in the garden. It is a very windy day.

programme.title: Hoopla Doopla!
programme.desc: Ziggy loves music and is sure that if he had the right instrument he would be a fantastic player. He orders several musical instrument in the mail, but all of his friends seem to be able to play them better than he can.

programme.title: Daniel Tigers Neighbourhood
programme.desc: When joining Mum Tiger for a picnic at the playground, Daniel gets distracted playing instead of sitting down for lunch. Mum and Dad Tiger remind Daniel that meals are a special time to spend together.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Sula have a lovely time in the park clambering around on the trees. At first its Sula who needs Bings help to climb up but when Bing climbs a bit too high he gets stuck and then he needs some help himself.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George go with Mummy Pig to Miss Rabbits Mummies Fire Engine Service.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: Bitzers over-officious management style becomes too much for the sheep who decide its time for him to chill out. Bitzers tasks for the day takes on a new purpose, for everyone to have some fun!

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The bath tap at the Little Castle is dripping, so the elf plumber is called. Its a bigger job than first expected, but with King and Queen Marigolds coming around, theres not much time to get it looking tip-top.

programme.title: Ariel
programme.desc: Ariel helps Ravi at work. Ariel preps Ayanna for picture day.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.sub-title: Bumpy And The Wise Old Wolfhound
programme.desc: Bingo is sick in hospital, so Bluey and Dad send her a homemade video to lift her spirits. It tells the tale of Barnicus quest to heal her spotty dog named Bumpy.

programme.title: Knee High Spies
programme.desc: The team are on a madcap midnight mission to stop Silver Paw and Pranksy stealing Lauchies tooth before the tooth fairy arrives.

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: The Zee Mobile can count chickens at the farm, but needs the Mecha Builders to step in when it wont stop crashing into MacBarms barn door.

programme.title: PJ Masks Power Heroes: Heroes Of Space
programme.desc: Newton feels unappreciated by his friends and decides to head off and explore solo but falls into the clutches of Gloop III.

programme.title: Andy And The Band
programme.desc: Leo and Jimi are locked in detention and will miss their gig - can the band bust them out?

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George sailing, but they keep getting stuck in the mud!

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: Cosima and Big Lizard are helping Dad train for his astronaut fitness test. When Rex gets in to trouble Dads hard work finally pays off.

programme.title: Vida The Vet
programme.desc: Prickly insists he "doesnt like" ice skating. Vida gives him vet care AND sage advice.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.sub-title: The Octonauts And The Humpback Whales
programme.desc: When a sardine swallows the key to a treasure chest, a humpback whale helps Kwazii track it down.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Romeo challenges Carly and Cartoka to a race, but its all part of a sneaky plan to steal speed crystals.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Thomas helps Ruth fix up an old windmill into her new, energy-efficient workshop.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Costa and the junior gardeners get "buzzy" making hotels for native bees in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It is Molly Moles first day at school and she quickly makes best friends with Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit.

programme.title: Wilfrid Gordon Mcdonald Partridge
programme.desc: When 6-year-old Wilfrid discovers his 96-year-old best friend Nancy has lost her memory, he embarks on a heartwarming quest to help her remember. Based on the classic childrens book by Mem Fox.

programme.title: Octonauts: Above And Beyond
programme.desc: The Octonauts try to answer a wetas call for help, but they cant find the right one! Turns out there are many different species of weta in New Zealand, so they have to do some detective work to find their target.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Dad and his mates hit the backyard, ready to rip up some tree stumps! But when BlueyÂ and Bingo take overÂ a stump asÂ aÂ nail salon, Dad finds hes got some negotiating to do.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee blows up some balloons for Tino the artistic mouses birthday, but the squirrels are worried because Tino can be grumpy.

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: A fitness device craze leads the Piris to compete for points with a most unlikely winner.

programme.title: In The Night Garden
programme.sub-title: Tombliboo Ooo Brings The Ball Indoors
programme.desc: The Tombliboos are playing inside when they hear something outdoors. Its the ball.

programme.title: Hoopla Doopla!
programme.desc: One day Bop sees the most beautiful butterfly in Hoopla, but when he catches it, it begins to look sad. He asks his friends to help cheer up the butterfly.

programme.title: Daniel Tigers Neighbourhood
programme.desc: Daniel is helping to make pan pans for dinner at the Platypus house. When Jodi gets distracted by her toy, she almost misses out on the fun, but remembers that dinnertime is better together.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bings friends are coming to his house for a cake party. Sula arrives first and Bing cant wait to show her the cake hes made, but he accidentally tips the cake off its stand and breaks it into pieces.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig, but Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: The farmer receives a mystery gift from his antipodean cousin. Unimpressed with the present, he attempts to throw it away only for it to keep reappearing. He becomes convinced it has magical powers.

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: When a spell accidentally goes wrong, Ben and Holly grow to human size! Now they are able to play with Lucy and her friends and want to stay big forever!

programme.title: Ariel
programme.sub-title: The Cuttlebaby Sitter / Flounder the Leader
programme.desc: Ariel babysits adorable cuttlebabies. Flounder is chosen as the team coach.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: On a trip to the Dump Dad claims hes the best at everything. But Bluey discovers that Dads throwing out her old drawing and questions if he really is the best Dad in the world.

programme.title: Knee High Spies
programme.desc: Lauchie is planning to bring Moss to take-your-pet-to-school day, but a jealous Silver Paw turtle-naps her. Can Jeremy and Deena find her in time for the morning school run?

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: Grandma and Timmy want to carve a sculpture out of stone for an art show, that is, if the Mechas can help them learn how to carve.

programme.title: Fireman Sam: Mystery At Pumpkin Hollow
programme.desc: Can the Detectives and The Why Files solve the cases of the mysteriously appearing pumpkins and strange snuffling noises?

programme.title: Maddie + Triggs
programme.desc: Maddie + Triggs sneak and creak their way past Mum and Dads bedroom in search of a tasty treat, only to discover they may not be the only ones searching for a midnight feast.

programme.title: Andy And The Band
programme.desc: The band go back in time to rescue treasure for a fan who turns out to be Maid Marian.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are shocked to find their new bedrooms empty! Mummy and Daddy Pig tell them they will be the ones decorate their rooms, so they all go to a furniture shop to create the best rooms ever!

programme.title: Ginger And The Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger releases a cage of Baby Coconutdons into the jungle but quickly learns that theyve been contained for their own good! Ginger and the Baby Pea-Rexes must think of clever ways to get them back.

programme.title: Vida The Vet
programme.desc: Sunny suddenly refuses to see the Sweetwood Band. Vida discovers he needs earmuffs for the show!

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.sub-title: The Octonauts And The Duck-billed Platypus
programme.desc: While rescuing river creatures after a storm, the Octonauts find a strange egg.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.sub-title: The Pj Riders Save The Day
programme.desc: The PJ Riders are jealous when the PJs plan to restore their vehicles.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: When the Rickety Old Bridge collapses, trapping Toby and Henrietta on the other side of the ravine, Inventor Ruth is asked to build a new one.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Hannah and Zsofi plant a colourful edible flower garden, perfect for a yummy garden tea party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Its Richard Rabbits birthday party and George is invited, and that can only mean one thing; Soft Play!

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale Of The Flying Fox
programme.desc: Peter finds a mysterious key hidden in his fathers journal and is determined to find out what it fits. But his insatiable curiosity leads him into Mr Tods lair and a trap!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Bluey accidentally makes Bingo upset playing a game at dinner, she will do anything to make her happy again - even changing the rules of the game. But nothing seems to work.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The dog and the squirrels decide to play hide and seek and Duggee finds them all except Roly.

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: A mystery gossiper causes friction on the berg until Brinicle sets a clever trap.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Follow the latest on todays news, covering whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Craig Smart in Perth.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News. Weve got more reporters in more places, connecting communities and covering the stories and issues that matter to you. Presented by Craig Smart.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: The latest international news and the days top stories from a European perspective. Our broadcast partner DW brings you live coverage from Berlin with updated reports and expert analysis on the big global issues and events.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: The latest international news and the days top stories from a European perspective. Our broadcast partner DW brings you live coverage from Berlin with updated reports and expert analysis on the big global issues and events.

programme.title: The World
programme.desc: Anthony Albanese will attend the G20 Leaders Summit in Johannesburg, capping off a busy summit season, but three of the worlds most powerful leaders wont be there - Trump, Putin and Xi. Manny Tsigas has todays world news.

programme.title: Planet America: Weekend Edition
programme.desc: Chas and John look at whats not likely to be released in the Epstein files and Epsteins links to Israel, plus the latest polls not looking good for Trump, and the Republican redistricting plan for Texas has backfired.

programme.title: Asia News Week
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of the stories making news across the Asia region, plus whats trending on social media and making an impact on the culture and the way people live.

programme.title: Play On
programme.desc: Connor OLeary, a Cronulla surfer who now surfs for Japan. Pasifika rugby league players on their connection to their homeland. And Gronya Somerville, a badminton player exploring her ties to Chinese aristocracy.

programme.title: Jim Maxwells Ashes Memories
programme.sub-title: 1972 - A Bob Massie Masterclass at Lords
programme.desc: Jim Maxwell and Corbin Middlemas look back at some of the moments that have defined the Ashes rivalry. Part two follows Jim to Lords in 1972 where he watched from the stands as Bob Massie put on a bowling clinic.

programme.title: Not Stupid
programme.desc: Democrats and Republicans voted unanimously to release the full Epstein files, and Trump has now signed the bill. He had faced growing pressure to make the files public and had a major dispute with a fellow MAGA leader.

programme.title: Not Stupid
programme.desc: Democrats and Republicans voted unanimously to release the full Epstein files, and Trump has now signed the bill. He had faced growing pressure to make the files public and had a major dispute with a fellow MAGA leader.

programme.title: ABC News Regional
programme.desc: An ambitious project harnessing the outback sun gets the go ahead, traditional owners seek inspiration to recreate the Juukan Gorge rock shelter, and Australias longest running radio program celebrates a big milestone.

programme.title: Insiders
programme.desc: David Speers discusses the week in politics with Niki Savva, Tom Crowley and Mark Kenny including Victorian and NSW Liberals topple and install new leaders, plus COP, G20, environment laws, CSIRO cuts and hospital funding.

programme.title: ABC News
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: ABC News Update

programme.title: ABC News With Auslan
programme.desc: The latest news and information from ABC News. This bulletin will be Auslan interpreted to provide accessible information to keep Australias deaf community connected and informed. Presented by Melissa Mackay.

programme.title: ABC Evening News
programme.desc: For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australias best investigative journalism. Round the clock coverage of the news that matters to you from the team you can trust.

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the days top stories and latest news with more reporters to tell you whats going on and why it matters. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: ABC News NT: Cyclone Fina
programme.desc: Live from Darwin, the latest from ABC News NT. Kyle Dowling and the ABC News team bring you comprehensive reporting on Cyclone Fina, plus the days top stories.

programme.title: Australian Story
programme.sub-title: The Shoot Out - Race Around The World
programme.desc: Untold stories from behind the scenes of Race Around the World, the show that launched John Safran and become one of the 90s unlikeliest TV hits. (Final)

programme.title: Compass
programme.desc: Theres a disturbing trend taking place in our schools and misogyny is on the rise in classrooms. Siobhan Marin investigates how we can tackle this issue without alienating boys or tipping them further into the manosphere.
